title: New Fitbit Alta HR - "Tightrope"
description: Move to the beat of you with Fitbit Alta HR—the slimmest wristband with continuous heart rate that motivates you to reach your goals in style. Jumpstart your fitness journey with PurePulse heart rate and SmartTrack automatic exercise recognition. Track your all-day activity and sleep stages, stay connected with smartphone notifications, and get friendly Reminders to Move.
